title: Felon - S2E7 - David O'Hearn and Frank Arkell (Part 2 of 4)
content:encoded:
Two weeks after the brutal death of David O’Hearn, investigators had seemed to have reached an end to their leads…it would take another murder to help get the investigation back on track….
